body.p: To sort an entire table either right click the table and select Sort, or select the table and click Sort on the main toolbar. Any of the two opens the Sort dialog box.
This dialog box sets the range that is sorted and the sorting criterion. The range is selected automatically depending on whether you sort an entire table or only a selection of its rows.
body.note: When you invoke the sorting operation over an entire table, the Selected rows option is disabled.
body.p: The sort criteria is set automatically to the column where the caret is located at the time when the sorting operation is invoked.
body.note: The sorting mechanism of recognizes multiple date formats like short, medium, long, full, xs:date, and xs:dateTime.
body.p: After you finish configuring the options in the Sort dialog box, click OK to complete the sorting operation. In case you want to go back to the initial order of your content, press on your keyboard.The sorting support takes into account the value of the xml:lang attribute and sorts the content in a natural order.
